title: Figure 1: Login Page
description: Upon entering the app, users are presented with the login page. From here, they can login, create an account, or continue as guests. If users have created an account but have forgotten the password, they will have the option to go through the password recovery process via the “Forgot Password?” link.

title: Figure 3: Drawer Menu
description: When the user clicks on the drawer menu from any of the app’s pages, they will be presented with the menu. This menu will provide them with navigation to the login, dashboard, live monitoring, and about pages.

title: Figure 4: Crime Live Monitoring & Reporting
description: When the user clicks on the “+” button from the landing page, they will be prompted with the crime reporting feature. This page will let the user enter their location, select which category the crime belongs to, and describe it.
